Help
You're viewing an online version of the book, An Introduction to Programming in Wenyan Language. Wenyan is a programming language in Classical Chinese. Coincidentally, this book is also written in Classical Chinese.
How to navigate?
Scroll with scrollwheel or trackpad, or drag the scrollbar at the bottom. To jump to a chapter, click on the tab bearing its title.
Slow with vertical text?
Read the markdowns directly on Github.
Don't know Classical Chinese?
Check out the wenyan-wiki (English).
